# Module Assessments

Make sure you've gone through all the content for this module.


## Quiz

Do the quiz for this module on eLC. The quiz consists of around 5-10 questions. It is timed, so you need to have gone through the material and either remember some of the main items or at least remember where you saw it so you can look it up quickly.


## Exercise

For this module, do the exercise called _Variable Selection_. In this exercise, you will apply the topics covered in this module, as well as some of the other analysis and model fitting tasks we covered.
